component.name: PanelSetSceneExample
component.script:
sub init() m.top.backgroundURI = "pkg:/images/rsgde_bg_hd.jpg"
m.top.Overhang.showOptions = true
m.readContentTask = createObject("roSGNode", "ContentReader") m.readContentTask.observeField("content", "setpanels") m.readContentTask.contenturi = "http://www.sdktestinglab.com/Tutorial/content/overhangpanelsetcontent.xml" m.readContentTask.control = "RUN" end sub
sub setpanels() m.listpanel = m.top.panelSet.createChild("CategoryList") m.listpanel.list.content = m.readContentTask.content
'm.panel = m.top.panelSet.createChild("PanelExample") m.gridpanel = m.top.panelSet.createChild("GridPanelExample")
'm.panel = createObject("roSGNode", "PanelExample") m.panel = m.top.panelSet.createChild("PanelExample")
m.listpanel.list.observeField("itemFocused", "showpanelinfo") 'm.gridpanel.observeField("focusedChild", "slidepanels")
m.listpanel.setFocus(true) end sub
sub showpanelinfo() panelcontent = m.listpanel.list.content.getChild(m.listpanel.list.itemFocused)
'm.panel.description = panelcontent.description
'm.top.panelSet.appendChild(m.panel)
m.gridpanel.overhangtext = panelcontent.shortdescriptionline1 m.gridpanel.gridcontenturi = panelcontent.url end sub
sub slidepanels() if not m.top.panelSet.isGoingBack 'm.top.panelSet.appendChild(m.panel) 'm.gridpanel.setFocus(true) 'm.panel.setFocus(true) else 'm.gridpanel.setFocus(true) end if end sub
